flowRoot.flowPara: Writer's Tools is a set of utilities designed to help OpenOffice.org users perform a wide range of tasks. Using Writer's Tools, you can back up documents, look up and translate words and phrases, manage text snippets, and keep tabs on document statistics.
Lookup Tool lets you look up the currently selected word in several online references, including Cambridge Dictionaries, WordNet, and Google Define.
Writer's Tools is Free and Open Source software licensed under the GNU General Public License Version 2 (GPL).
Backup tools allow you to save the currently opened document to a remote server, the Amazon S3 service as well as send it to a specified email address.
Timer tool can be used to keep tabs on the time spent on the currently opened document and save the time data (the document name, used time, and date) in the accompanying WriterDB database.
Bookmarks tool allows you to bookmark often-used documents, so you can access them with a few mouse clicks.
Add to Notebook tool is designed to quickly add text snippets, links, and notes to the supplied database. You can also categorize and tag the added entries.
Tasks tool is a no-frills to-do manager that allows you to keep tabs on your tasks.
WriterDB database contains several modules, including Writer's Notes, Writer's Notebook, and Writer's Submission Tracker.
Writer's Submission Tracker allows you not only to keep tabs on your submissions, but also store documents directly in the database.
miniInvoices is a customizable invoicing solution for writers. miniInvoices is built with OpenOffice.org Base and relies on the Sun Report Builder extension.
miniInvoices features support for multiple currencies and basic reporting capabilities. The latter allows the user to generate print-ready invoices and earning reports.
miniInvoices is available as a separate download

Writer's Tools is available for download from the project's site at Google Code: writertools.googlecode.com The site also provides further more detailed information about the extension. To discuss Writer's Tools and get help with the extension, visit the WriterTools Google group: groups.google.com/group/writertools
Writer's Tools Manual can help you to get the most out of the Writer's Tools extension. The manual is available from Lulu.om: bit.ly/writertoolsmanual
